metadata.title: Ship Name Generator - Create Perfect Names for Your Vessel
metadata.description: Generate unique and meaningful names for your vessel using our smart ship name generator. Supporting various styles including romantic, adventure, luxury, and more.

home.title: Ship Name Generator
home.subtitle: Create the Perfect Name for Your Vessel
home.step1Description: Input two names in the fields below to personalize your ship name.
home.step2Description: Select from our themed styles to match your preferences.
home.step3Description: Click the button and our AI will create the perfect name for your vessel.
home.resultDescription: Click a name to select it. Not quite right? Keep generating until you find the perfect one!
home.error: An error occurred while generating names. Please try again.
home.exampleDescription: Here are some examples of generated names:
